meanings.sent1: The uncleaner dishes were left in the sink for days.
meanings.sent2: The uncleaner room had clothes scattered all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The uncleaner puppy happily rolled in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The uncleaner streets of the city were a stark contrast to the pristine park.
meanings.sent5: The uncleaner water in the pond was filled with algae and debris.

meanings.definition: Making or leaving something dirty or contaminated.
meanings.sent1: The uncleaner hands left smudges on the glass window.
meanings.sent2: The uncleaner kitchen sponge spread germs instead of cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The uncleaner shoes tracked mud all over the freshly mopped floor.
meanings.sent4: The uncleaner habits of littering harm the environment.
meanings.sent5: The uncleaner air in the factory made it hard to breathe.
